name: Shout
description: A campus safety app that helps students find blue lights around them, get in touch with taxi services, get directions to home, and call emergency services, all at the touch of a button. This app has been released for iOS and Android phones! The team is now working to combat the problem of sexual assault, which plagues college campuses nationwide, by building an anonymous reporting service for survivors. The collected data will be mapped to warn other users of potentially dangerous areas on campus.
subheader: Reach Out. Find Out. Go Out.
problem: In order to raise awareness of sexual assault on campus and give survivors a voice to share their stories and locate regions on campus where incidents have occurred.

one.title: Find Out
one.description: Newsfeed that lists all of the reports and stories that are posted to the app. The reports include a title, brief description, date, and location and can be clicked on to see more information.

two.title: Go Out
two.description: The map interface that includes a search bar to find locations and reports on campus.

three.title: Reach Out
three.description: The Resources page that lists hotlines available for those in need and organizations and centers to contact on campus.

name: CU Orientation
description: Orientation Week is an exciting and equally nervous time for incoming freshmen and transfer students, but we were perplexed by one simple inefficiency: the orientation booklet. Everyone would carry around the 20-page booklet everywhere, only to get overwhelmed with follow-up emails about updated and canceled events. So, we digitized it! CU Orientation displays all scheduled events for the week, filters for events, and directions to each event. This app has been used by more than 2,000 incoming freshmen during August 2017 and January 2018 orientation!
problem: Cornell is big. Orientation week is messy. New students shouldn't have to worry about getting lost, losing track of events, or knowing which ones to go to.

one.title: Find it
one.description: Search for new events by keyword

two.title: Remind me
two.description: Be notified 1 hour before any events required for your major

three.title: Get there
three.description: Directions to any event only a single click away

name: CU Reviews
description: Honest feedback about courses that you're planning to take is hard to come by. CU Reviews solves precisely this problem, by giving students access to student-submitted reviews of Cornell courses from past semesters. Learn more about the difficulty, median grade, and quality of the classes that you're planning to take!
subheader: Classes are hard, knowing that they are shouldn't be!
problem: "Did you take this class?  Was homework difficult?  Who is the best professor?"  Asking upperclassmen about classes every year is tedious and unreliable. We wanted an easy way to share experiences and find essential information about classes in one site.

one.title: Search for Classes
one.description: Search for Cornell classes using our fast search

two.title: Write a Review
two.description: Write about the class and rate its difficulty and workload

three.title: Check Out Class Reviews
three.description: Read what other students have to say about the class

name: Project Samwise
description: A leading cause of stress at Cornell is the relentless pace of deadlines and events that one has to keep track of. Project Samwise is a task visualization web app designed for Cornell students, which helps them keep an eye on their upcoming project deadlines, prelims, and any other important events.
subheader: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing
problem: Managing a full credit-load and a healthy life is difficult. As due dates approach, it becomes easy to misjudge the amount of work remaining for any given assignment. By creating your tangible timeline, completing work no longer means giving up sleep.

one.title: Visualize Your Workload
one.description: Seeing is believing. Samwise makes it easy to see all your tasks in one place. Take the guesswork out of homework.

two.title: Add Classes With Ease
two.description: Adding a class has never been easier! No more scouring syllabi and websites. Just type your course and let Samwise do the rest.

three.title: Tasks and Events Made Easy
three.description: It's hard to know what information is important when you write your tasks. Samwise employs meaningful queries to provoke proactive thoughts that enable students to capture important details. Spend less time planning and more time doing.

name: Research Connect
description: The abundance of undergraduate research opportunities is one of the great things about Cornell, yet unfortunately the process of finding these opportunities is still very unstructured. One must knock on doors, send countless emails to professors, and make do with obsolete web pages to seek research opportunities. Research Connect aims to bridge this gap by providing a structured platform where students can find opportunities, and research labs can find the students they are looking for.
problem: The abundance of undergraduate research opportunities is one of the great things about Cornell, yet unfortunately the process of finding these opportunities is still very unstructured. One must knock on doors, send countless emails to professors, and make do with obsolete web pages to seek research opportunities. Research Connect aims to bridge this gap by providing a structured platform where students can find opportunities, and research labs can find the students they are looking for.

one.title: Find Research Opportunities
one.description: Instead of having to email a plethora of researchers (many of whom aren't even accepting undergrads), we streamline the process by showing undergrads all the opportunities available to them.

two.title: View Requirements & Apply Online
two.description: Find out exactly what requirements the lab is searching for so you don't waste your time applying for positions that don't match your background. You can also apply straight from our platform to avoid going back and forth with emails.

three.title: Search Through All Faculty & See Who's Accepting (Coming Fall 2018)
three.description: Search for faculty in all departments who are conducting research in a specific area so you don't miss out on those professors in other departments conducting work that you'd be interested in. Also see which professors are open to receiving undergrad research requests so you don't waste your time emailing uninterested labs.

name: Queue Me In
description: With an exponential increase in enrollment in popular majors such as Computer Science and Information Science, TA office hours have become a relatively scarce resource. Long wait times and overcrowded rooms are the norm in these majors â€“ hence, we're building an online queuing solution, which is designed to bring some amount of order to this chaos.
subheader: The answer to all your office hour Q's.
problem: Too often, office hours are crowded and unorganized. Queue Me In allows students to join the line from anywhere and track their position in real-time so they know when their turn is coming. Through our analytics, professors can gain insight into where and when students need the most help and how effective TAs are at answering questions. Queue Me In removes the frustration from office hours and empowers professors to use data to better help their students.

one.title: Pick a session
one.description: Browse upcoming office hours by day to pick one that works best for you. You can see whether or not the queue has opened, and how many students have already entered a question!

two.title: Add your question
two.description: Join an office hour session! By adding your question, you can secure your place in line without worrying about other students cutting in.

three.title: View the queue
three.description: You can find an opportunity to listen in for a question you also have, or view other questions asked to understand overall problem areas.
